string.value: I thought there would be no problem in the clock tower since I stopped the crack of dimension and got rid of #o8500002#, but I still have things to do. Let's go to #b#p2041021##k.

#p2041021# said that once the crack occurs on the wall of dimension, it becomes weak so that can easily have holes. He was worried that #o8500002# will attack again. #p2041021# asked me to check out on #b#p2041023##k monitoring around the operation room if #o8500002# comes in.
#p2041023# said #o8500002# invaded again showing me the evidence of a piece of dimension crack. He asked me to get rid of #o8500002# as I once killed #o8500002# that I can do it again....
안녕하세요, 강하고 현명하고 용감한 모험가님~! 당신 덕분에 새로운 시간의 구를 만들어 시계탑의 힘을 유지시킬 수 있었습니다! 정말 감사했어요! 그런데... 당신께서 도와주신게 다 소용없게 되어 버리는 것 같아 걱정이네요. 무슨 일이냐고요?
한 번 구멍이 뚫렸던 차원의 벽은 예전 같은 힘을 잃어버렸답니다. 차원의 균열을 막아 틈을 없앴지만 이젠 약간의 충격에도 금방 구멍이 생기게 되고 말았어요. 그 틈을 타서 다시 한 번 파풀라투스가 공격해 들어오는 것은 아닐지 걱정이네요.
그래서 말인데... 모험가님께서 플로에게 가보시지 않겠어요? 차원의 벽에 무슨 일이 생길 때를 대비해서, 플로가 동력실을 감시중이거든요. 모험가님께서 플로에게 가서, 혹시라도 무슨 일이 생기지는 않았는지 확인해 주세요!
역시! 정의로운 모험가님이라면 그렇게 대답하실 줄 알았죠! 훗훗! 그렇다면 어서 플로에게 가주세요!
흐음~ 곤란하신 건가요? 슬프네요. 모험가님이라면 틀림없이 도와주실 거라고 생각했는데...

Hello to the strong, intelligent and brave adventurer ~! You have created a new era by maintainiing the power of Clocktower! Really thank you! But... But you look like you are worrying about something. What's the matter?

The power of dimension wall is starting to lose it power due the single crack found on the wall. Although the crack of dimension is protected but little shock can create a crack again. This little gap will be a loop-hole and it can be attacked by #o8500002# again. I am so worried.

That's why... The adventure won't go to #p2041023#? For the wall of dimension with some matter, #p2041023# is watching the Power Room. The adventurer go to #b#p2041023##k, and please check about what is happened!
Yeah! If it's the righteous adventure, will answer like that! huhhuh! If so, please go to #p2041023#!
Hmm~ inconvenience? So sad. Hoped the adventure will provide some help in a way or two...
Awwlar~ Who is that! You the adventurer who treated to #o8500002# ! You certainly arrived on the correct time! You help is needed! What's matter? Watch this! \n\n #i4031179# #t4031179#
A moment ago, while patrolling the Power Room, #t4031179# is discovered. Upon seeing this, #o8500002# is seen trying to pierce through the wall of dimension and of course, invading the Clocktower!
If #o8500002# is eliminated by the adventurer once, it will not be too difficult on the second try? So, I'll give you this and please go to the Power Room again and eliminate the #o8500002#. Please!

Watching to Patrol List, #t4031179# usually appear once per a day. Huhuh~ the wall of dimension is so weak. That kind appeared... This time is fine with your help, but if #o8500002# appear again, what should we do... It's always a better choice with someone around watching the movement of #o8500002#.
Looks like you are not going to see #b#p2041023##k yet? #p2041023# is watching the Power Room, so if there is any problems with dimension wall, he will know that.
